description:
Luffy`s gigantic attack on Lucci takes a devastating toll on his body, Robin rejoins the fight, and the rest of the Straw Hats struggle to survive underwater!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Mysterious Mermaid Appears? As Consciousness Fades Away...
Maboroshi no Ningyo Arawaru? Usureyuku Ishiki no Naka de
Une sirène illusoire à la rescousse ? Une conscience vacillante...
Видение таинственной русалки? На грани меркнущего сознания
ظهور حوريّة غامضة؟ مع تلاشي الوعي...
幻の人魚現る? 薄れゆく意識のなかで
